en.title: Your account
en.passwordHelper: 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase, 1 special character, 8 to 32 characters
en.deleteAccountModalSubTitle: Once your account has been deleted you will no longer be able to access your data.
en.deleteAccountModalMessage: Enter your password to delete your account.
en.deleteErrorBookingsOwnerTitle: You still have upcoming bookings as an owner
en.deleteErrorBookingsOwnerDescription: Cancel future bookings before deleting your account.
en.deleteErrorBookingsSitterTitle: You still have upcoming bookings as a pet sitter
